ThingDef.Name: PSPJACKHAMMER_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona NC05 jackhammer
ThingDef.description: The legendary NC05 Jackhammer heavy shotgun's stopping power and sustained fire capabilities make it a frightening weapon in close quarters combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPGAUSSSAW_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona NC6 gauss SAW
ThingDef.description: The NC6 Gauss SAW's low production cost, reliability, and sheer stopping power lead to wide-spread adoption of the weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPWARDEN_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Warden
ThingDef.description: The accurate Warden semi-automatic battle rifle is effective at stopping infantry far past the typical LMG or carbine.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPCYCLONE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona AF-4 cyclone
ThingDef.description: The AF-4 Cyclone is a fully automatic submachine gun that has a higher damage output than most weapons in its class.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPMAGSHOT_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona NC4 mag-shot
ThingDef.description: The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPPHOENIX_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona NC15 phoenix
ThingDef.description: The powerful NC15 Phoenix uses a camera guided missile that allows the user to adjust its trajectory mid-flight.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPMCG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona T7 mini-chaingun
ThingDef.description: The sound of the menacing T7 MCG firing strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. It is capable of sustained fire that can tear apart entire squads.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPCARV_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona T9 CARV
ThingDef.description: Aptly named, the T9 CARV's rate of fire allows it to cut through whole groups of enemies before needing to reload.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPAMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona AMR-66
ThingDef.description: The semi-automatic AMR-66 battle rifle uses powerful cartridges that hold considerable stopping power up to medium range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPARMISTICE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SMG-46 armistice
ThingDef.description: The SMG-46 Armistice fully automatic submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPREPEATER_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona TX1 repeater
ThingDef.description: The reliable TX1 Repeater is the latest iteration of a firearm design that has stretched back for 300 years. Its three round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPSTRIKER_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona T2 Striker
ThingDef.description: The dumbfire-capable T2 Striker houses a six-round magazine of compact, heat-seeking rockets that will home in when within proximity of enemy aircraft.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPLASHER_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lasher X2
ThingDef.description: The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPORION_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Orion VS54
ThingDef.description: The Orion VS54's lightweight construction allows for more accurate hip fire and stability when on the move when compared to most weapons in its class.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPEIDOLON_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Eidolon VE33
ThingDef.description: The heavy-hitting eidolon VE33 features accurate semi-automatic fire capable of dropping distant targets with ease.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. ThingDef.Name: PSPBEAMER_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Beamer VS3
ThingDef.description: The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PSPLANCER_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Lancer VS22

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity.
